test_thoughts.thought: I missed one workout so this whole week is pointless
test_thoughts.context: Started a new program 2 weeks ago, had to work late yesterday

test_thoughts.thought: Everyone else at the gym is so much stronger than me
test_thoughts.context: Just joined a gym for the first time

test_thoughts.thought: I'll never get fit, I'm too far behind
test_thoughts.context: Tried to do a workout video and couldn't complete it

test_thoughts.thought: I'll start my workout plan on Monday
test_thoughts.context: It's Thursday and I haven't worked out this week

test_thoughts.thought: I don't look like someone who works out, I don't belong here
test_thoughts.context: At the gym for the 4th time

test_thoughts.thought: I need the perfect gym setup before I can start working out
I'm just not athletic, I never will be
test_thoughts.context: Struggled with a beginner HIIT workout

test_thoughts.thought: I feel weak so I must be weak
If I can't do the full workout, why bother
test_thoughts.context: Only have 20 minutes today instead of the planned 45

test_thoughts.thought: I ate dessert, my entire diet is ruined
test_thoughts.context: Had ice cream after dinner with family

test_thoughts.thought: I'm too old to start getting fit now
I'm too tired to workout right now
test_thoughts.context: Just finished work, sitting on couch

test_thoughts.thought: My form has to be perfect or I shouldn't do it at all
Why is everyone else progressing faster than me
test_thoughts.context: Seeing friends' workout posts on social media

test_thoughts.thought: This injury means I can never workout again
test_thoughts.context: Minor shoulder strain from overhead press

edge_cases.thought: I love working out and feel great about my progress!
I'm going to try my best today
I'm feeling sore from yesterday's workout, so I'll do some light stretching today

multi_bias_examples.thought: I'm too old and too far behind, I'll never catch up. Everyone else started when they were young.
multi_bias_examples.context: 50 years old, comparing to 20-somethings at gym

multi_bias_examples.thought: I don't feel like working out today, and if I can't do the full hour, there's no point anyway
